Generation IV.Diamond: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.
Generation IV.Pearl: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
Generation IV.Platinum: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.
Generation IV.HeartGold: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor , they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor , they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
